DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to estimate the incidence of posttraumatic hypopituitarism, and to identify predisposing factors in order to establish a rational responsible socioeconomic screening program.
DOC.brief_title: Posttraumatic Hypopituitarism - Incidence, Predictors and Test Validity
DOC.criteria: International Classification of Diseases (ICD) 10 code S06.006.9 Age 18 65 years at time of traumatic brain injury Duration of hospitalization > 24 hours. Known pituitary disease Clinically significant liver or renal disease Breastfeeding Pregnancy Alcohol or drug abuse
